column1: Attorney-General  when  deciding  the  course  of  action  that  should  be  taken  against  the
Petitioner and the other persons named as Respondents in the Report marked as 'P3' to the
The Petitioner further argued that he was led to believe and had a legitimate expectation that
no findings and recommendations would be made against the Petitioner and there would be
no  material  collected  against  the  Petitioner  to  the  detriment  of  the  Petitioner.  In  these
circumstances, the Petitioner gave evidence, as was asked.
